Pre-Game Insights: The Cleveland Guardians will square off with the Houston Astros in Game 2 of the American League Division Series at Progressive Field on Sunday, commencing at 8:10am AEST.
The Guardians will have Ben Lively (13-9, 3.80 ERA) start, while the Astros are going with Justin Verlander (4-6, 5.55 ERA).
Stats Insider's predictive analytics model currently gives the Guardians a 54% chance of winning against the Astros at Progressive Field.
The Guardians are 1.5-run favourites against the Astros, with odds of $2.50 available at TAB.
The over/under for total runs scored is set at 7.5 with TAB, which has odds of $1.91 for the over and $1.91 for the under.
